overview: It is a co-production between Chile and Brazil. Angela Mendes narrates the letter she writes to her father, Chico Mendes. The environmentalist tells how she met her father, through mosaics of reports. Angela invites the viewer to participate in the letter with their imagination. Her voice narrates in thought to the beyond, a beyond that is close to us, as Angela and Chico's reality is our everyday reality.
title: Voices for the Future
